Uses of Class
org.jppf.client.JPPFJob

  • Packages that use JPPFJob 
    Package Description
    org.jppf.client
    Support for the clients connecting to the JPPF driver.
    org.jppf.client.event
    Support for event handling in the JPPF client.
    org.jppf.client.persistence
    Classes for an API that enables persistence of jobs and their state.
    org.jppf.client.utils
    Utilities pertaining to the client APIs.
    org.jppf.jca.cci
    Classes supporting the common client interface for the JPPF resource adapter.
    org.jppf.jca.demo
    Demo classes for the JPPF resource adapter.

    • Uses of JPPFJob in org.jppf.jca.cci

      Methods in org.jppf.jca.cci with parameters of type JPPFJob 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String JPPFConnection.submit(JPPFJob job)
      Submit a job to the JPPF client.
      This method exits immediately after adding the request to the requests queue.
      The returned id is used to later retrieve the results and status of the execution.
      String JPPFConnection.submit(JPPFJob job, SubmissionStatusListener listener)
      Submit a job to the JPPF client.
      This method exits immediately after adding the request to the requests queue.
      The returned id is used to later retrieve the results and status of the execution.
